00148   Ny=param_m2.nmeas;

00176   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){

00191   stop = clock();

00193   printf("Time initalization: %f \n\n", t);

00200   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp2);

00202   //FFT plan

00204               fft_temp1, fft_temp1, 
00205               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00206 
00207   planadj = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00208               fft_temp2, fft_temp2, 
00209               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);

00212   datafwd[0] = (void*)&param_m1;
00213   datafwd[1] = (void*)deconv;
00214   datafwd[2] = (void*)&gmat;

00222   dataadj[4] = (void*)fft_temp2;

00224 
00225   printf("FFT plan done \n\n");

00228   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00229   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xinc, datafwd);
00230   stop = clock();
00231   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00232   printf("Time forward operator: %f \n\n", t);
00233

00235   //Noise realization
00236   //Input snr
00237   snr = 30.0;
00238   a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1);
00239   sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0))/sqrt(Ny);
00240 
00241     
00242   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00243       noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00244       y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00245   }
00246 
00247   //Rescaling the measurements
00248 
00249   aux2 = (double)Ny/(double)Nx;
00250 
00251   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00252     y[i] = y[i]/sqrt(aux2);
00253   }
00254 
00255   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00256     deconv[i] = deconv[i]/sqrt(aux2);
00257   }
00258   
00259   
00260   // Output image.
00261   img_copy.fov_x = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00262   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00263   img_copy.nx = param_m1.nx1;
00264   img_copy.ny = param_m1.ny1;
00265 
00266   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00267     xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00268   }
00269   
00270   //Dirty image
00271   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xoutc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00272   img_copy.pix = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00273   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(img_copy.pix);
00274 
00275   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00276     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00277   }
00278   
00279   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31dirty.fits", filetype_img);

00281 
00282   
00283   //SARA structure initialization
00284 
00285     param1.ndict = Nb;
00286     param1.real = 0;
00287 
00288     dict_types = malloc(param1.ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_type));
00289     PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dict_types);
00290 
00291 
00292     dict_types[0] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB1;
00293     dict_types[1] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB2;
00294     dict_types[2] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB3;

00296     dict_types[4] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB5;

00300     dict_types[8] = SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac;
00301

00305     datas[0] = (void*)&param1;

00308 
00309   //Scaling constants in the representation domain
00310 
00311   sopt_sara_analysisop((void*)dummyc, (void*)xoutc, datas);
00312 
00313   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++) {
00314     dummyr[i] = creal(dummyc[i]);
00315   }
00316 
00317   aux1 = purify_utils_maxarray(dummyr, Nr);
00318 
00319   
00320   // Output image.
00321   img_copy.fov_x = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00322   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00323   img_copy.nx = param_m1.nx1;
00324   img_copy.ny = param_m1.ny1;
00325 
00326 
00327 
00328   //Initial solution and weights
00329   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00330       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00331   }
00332   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++){
00333     w[i] = 1.0;
00334   }
00335   //Copy true image in xout
00336   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00337     xout[i] = creal(xinc[i]);
00338   }
00339 
00340 
00341 
00342   printf("**********************\n");
00343   printf("BPSA reconstruction\n");
00344   printf("**********************\n");
00345 
00346   
00347     
00348   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00349   param2.verbose = 2;
00350   param2.max_iter = 300;
00351   param2.gamma = gamma*aux1;
00352   param2.rel_obj = 0.001;
00353   param2.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux2);
00354   param2.epsilon_tol = 0.01;
00355   param2.real_data = 0;
00356   param2.cg_max_iter = 100;
00357   param2.cg_tol = 0.000001;
00358 
00359   
00360   //Initial solution
00361   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00362       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00363   }
00364  
00365   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00366   sopt_l1_sdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,
00367                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00368                    datafwd,
00369                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00370                    dataadj,
00371                    &sopt_sara_synthesisop,
00372                    datas,
00373                    &sopt_sara_analysisop,
00374                    datas,
00375                    Nr,
00376                    (void*)y, Ny, w, param2);
00377 
00378   stop = clock();
00379   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00380 
00381   printf("Time BPSA: %f \n\n", t); 
00382 
00383   
00384     //SNR
00385     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00386         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00387     }
00388     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00389     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00390     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00391     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00392 
00393 
00394     
00395   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00396     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00397   }
00398   
00399   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31bpsa.fits", filetype_img);
00400 
00401   //Residual image
00402 
00403   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xoutc, datafwd);
00404   alpha = -1.0 +0.0*I;
00405   cblas_zaxpy(Ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, y0, 1);
00406   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xinc, (void*)y0, dataadj);
00407 
00408   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00409     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xinc[i]);
00410   }
00411   
00412   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31bpsares.fits", filetype_img);
00413   
00414   //Error image
00415   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00416     img_copy.pix[i] = error[i];
00417   }
00418   
00419   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31bpsaerror.fits", filetype_img);
00420   
00421 
00422   
00423   //Free all memory
00424   purify_image_free(&img);
00425   purify_image_free(&img_copy);
00426   free(deconv);
00427   purify_visibility_free(&vis_test);
00428   free(y);
